title: Red lentil tarka dal with apricot and coriander naan bread
description: A classic fragrant tarka dal with sweet fruity apricot naan breads makes a perfect vegetarian dinner.
ingredients: 1 onion, half finely chopped, half finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
4 tbsp ghee, plus extra for greasing
4-6 tbsp chopped fresh coriander leaves, to serve
